name: HYUNDAI ACCENT LIMITED
description: The Hyundai Accent Limited is a subcompact car that offers a range of standard features, including a 1.6L I-4 engine, 15'' steel wheels, and a smartstream IVT 2-spd transmission. It also comes with advanced safety features, such as forward collision-avoidance assist, lane departure warning, and blind-spot monitoring. Additionally, the Limited trim level provides a more premium interior experience with features like heated front seats, a leather-wrapped steering wheel, and a touchscreen display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration.
rate: The overall rating of the Hyundai Accent Limited is around 8.5 out of 10

name: HYUNDAI ELANTRA N
description: The Hyundai Elantra N is a high-performance sedan that boasts a 276 hp, 289 lb.-ft 2.0L Turbo engine and a host of performance upgrades, making it a driver's car. With its sporty design, advanced technology, and premium interior features, the Elantra N offers a thrilling driving experience. Additionally, it comes with a range of advanced safety features, including forward collision-avoidance assist, lane departure warning, and blind-spot monitoring.
rate: The overall rating of the Hyundai Elantra N is around 8.5 out of 10

name: HYUNDAI GENESIS G70 3.3T SPORT PRESTIGE
description: The Hyundai Genesis G70 3.3T Sport Prestige is a high-performance luxury sedan that boasts a powerful 3.3-liter twin-turbo V6 engine, producing 365 horsepower and 376 lb-ft of torque, paired with an 8-speed automatic transmission and rear-wheel drive. This trim level features a premium interior with heated and ventilated seats, a 15-speaker Lexicon audio system, and advanced safety features like adaptive cruise control and lane-keep assist. The exterior is distinguished by its sport-tuned suspension, 19-inch alloy wheels, and unique design elements like a chrome-tipped exhaust and a distinctive grille.
rate: The overall rating of the Hyundai Genesis G70 3.3T Sport Prestige is around 8.5 out of 10

name: HYUNDAI IONIQ-5 LIMITED
description: The Hyundai Ioniq 5 Limited is a fully electric compact luxury crossover that boasts a sleek and futuristic design, featuring a spacious interior with premium materials, advanced technology, and a range of up to 303 miles on a single charge. It is powered by a dual-electric motor setup producing 320 horsepower and 446 lb-ft of torque, allowing for swift acceleration and smooth handling. The Limited trim adds luxurious amenities such as a panoramic sunroof, heated and ventilated front seats, and a 360-degree camera system, making it a compelling option in the EV market.
rate: The overall rating of the Hyundai Ioniq 5 Limited is around 8.5 out of 10

name: HYUNDAI KONA-N
description: The Hyundai Kona N is a high-performance variant of the subcompact Kona crossover, boasting a 276-horsepower turbocharged engine, sport-tuned suspension, and exclusive design elements such as 18-inch alloy wheels and a distinctive rear spoiler. It also features a range of advanced safety and convenience features, including forward collision avoidance, lane centering, and an 8-inch touchscreen display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto integration. The Kona N offers an exciting blend of performance, practicality, and value in a compact package.
rate: The overall rating of the Hyundai Kona N is around 8.8 out of 10

name: HYUNDAI PALISADE CALLIGRAPHY
description: The Hyundai Palisade Calligraphy is a luxurious trim level of the Palisade three-row midsize SUV, distinguished by its unique exterior design elements, including a distinctive grille, 20-inch alloy wheels, and a premium LED lighting signature. Inside, it features a lavish interior with quilted leather seats, a 12.3-inch digital instrument cluster, and a 10.25-inch touchscreen navigation system with premium audio and advanced safety features like a 360-degree camera system. The Palisade Calligraphy offers a sophisticated blend of style, comfort, and technology in a spacious and family-friendly package.
rate: The overall rating of the Hyundai Palisade Calligraphy is around 9.2 out of 10

name: HYUNDAI SANTA-FE CALLIGRAPHY
description: The Hyundai Santa Fe Calligraphy is a premium trim level of the Santa Fe midsize SUV, characterized by its upscale exterior design accents, including a unique grille, 20-inch alloy wheels, and a distinctive LED lighting signature. Inside, it features a luxurious interior with premium leather-trimmed seats, a 12.3-inch digital instrument cluster, and a 10.25-inch touchscreen navigation system with advanced safety features like a 360-degree camera system and a heads-up display. The Santa Fe Calligraphy offers a refined blend of style, comfort, and technology in a spacious and family-friendly package.
rate: The overall rating of the Hyundai Santa Fe Calligraphy is around 9.0 out of 10

name: HYUNDAI SONATA LIMITED
description: The Hyundai Sonata Limited is a top-of-the-line trim level of the Sonata midsize sedan, featuring a luxurious interior with premium leather-trimmed seats, heated and ventilated front seats, and a panoramic sunroof. It also boasts advanced technology features, including a 10.25-inch touchscreen navigation system, a 12-speaker Bose premium audio system, and a suite of safety features like forward collision avoidance and lane centering assist. On the outside, the Sonata Limited is distinguished by its sleek exterior design, 18-inch alloy wheels, and LED headlights.
rate: The overall rating of the Hyundai Sonata Limited is around 8.5 out of 10

name: HYUNDAI TUCSON LIMITED
description: The Hyundai Tucson Limited is a top-tier trim level of the Tucson compact SUV, offering a premium driving experience with a luxurious interior featuring heated and ventilated front seats, a power-adjustable driver's seat, and a panoramic sunroof. It also comes equipped with advanced safety features, including forward collision avoidance, lane departure warning, and blind-spot monitoring, as well as a range of convenience features like a hands-free power liftgate and a wireless charging pad. On the outside, the Tucson Limited boasts a sleek and sporty design, 19-inch alloy wheels, and LED headlights.
rate: The overall rating of the Hyundai Tucson Limited is around 8.8 out of 10

name: HYUNDAI VELOSTER-N
description: The Hyundai Veloster N is a high-performance variant of the Veloster coupe, designed to deliver a thrilling driving experience with its 275-horsepower turbocharged engine, sport-tuned suspension, and precise 6-speed manual transmission. Its aggressive exterior design features a unique front fascia, side skirts, and 18-inch alloy wheels, while the interior boasts sport seats, a performance-oriented instrument cluster, and a range of advanced safety features. The Veloster N offers an exceptional blend of power, handling, and value, making it a compelling choice for driving enthusiasts.
rate: The overall rating of the Hyundai Veloster N is around 9.2 out of 10

name: HYUNDAI VENUE LIMITED
description: The Hyundai Venue Limited is a top-of-the-line trim of the subcompact Venue crossover, offering a premium driving experience with its advanced safety features, upscale interior amenities, and sleek exterior design. The Limited trim builds upon the SEL trim, adding features such as a panoramic sunroof, heated front seats, and a navigation system with an 8-inch touchscreen display, while also offering a range of optional packages to further enhance its comfort, convenience, and technology. The Venue Limited provides an impressive blend of luxury, functionality, and value in the subcompact crossover segment.
rate: The overall rating of the Hyundai Venue Limited is around 8.5 out of 10
